remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援篩選時屬性設定為值。Filtering is supported when the property is set to the value. 當您建立 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Northwind 資料庫中擷取資料，並使用和。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using a and . 的隨時套用方法會執行，以擷取資料。The of the is applied anytime the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此範例中，包含篩選參數，而包含在預留位置集合。In this example, the contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 在事件，則 filter 參數會顯示在控制項。In the event, the filter parameter is displayed in a control.
